verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You Were There
I
looked around one day as my life fell apart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Would anyone help me to find my way?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I knew I needed you, Lord, to heal my wounded heart

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I needed you while others turned away!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: You were there when I was weary

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: You were there when I was strong

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: You were there when I had burdens

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: That last the whole night long,

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: You were there in the midnight

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: To show me that you cared.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Everytime I’d thought I’d fall,

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: You were there!

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: At times I was so low

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Not wanting to go on

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Not knowing that Your presence was so near.

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: But then I’d feel Your touch

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: And hear You gentle voice

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Whisp’ring there’s no need for you to fear.

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: You were there when I lost,

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: Loved ones dear to me

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: And You helped me to survive

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Upon life’s raging sea.

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: Lord, I need You for my trials

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: I cannot face alone

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: I still need You when I take my journey home

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: Every time I’d thought I’d fall,
